Bugzilla Issue Tracker¶

class importers.issue_tracker.bugzilla.issue2db_extract_main.BugzillaIssue2DbMain(db_name, project_name, repo_name, type, issue_tracker_name, url, product, before_date, num_processes, config, log_root_path)[source]¶

This class handles the import of Bugzilla issue tracker data

extract()[source]¶

extracts Bugzilla issue tracker data and stores it in the DB

class importers.issue_tracker.bugzilla.issue2db_update.BugzillaIssue2DbUpdate(db_name, project_name, repo_name, issue_tracker_name, url, product, num_processes, config, log_root_path)[source]¶

This class handles the update of Bugzilla issue tracker data

update()[source]¶

updates the Bugzilla issue tracker data stored in the DB

This class inserts the dependencies between Bugzilla issues

extracts Bugzilla issue dependency data and stores it in the DB

insert_issue(issue_own_id, issue_tracker_id, summary, component, version, hardware, priority, severity, reference_id, user_id, created_at, last_change_at)[source]¶

inserts an issue

Parameters:
  • issue_own_id (int) – data source issue id
  • issue_tracker_id (int) – issue tracker id
  • summary (str) – new issue description
  • component (str) – component where the issue was found
  • version (str) – version where the issue was found
  • hardware (str) – hardware where the issue was found
  • priority (str) – priority of the issue
  • severity (str) – severity of the issue
  • reference_id (int) – id of the Git reference where the issue was found
  • user_id (int) – issue creator id
  • created_at (str) – creation date of the issue
  • last_change_at (str) – last change date of the issue

  • body (str) – body of the comment
  • votes (int) – votes of the comment

  • created_at (str) – creation date of the comment

updates an issue

Parameters:
  • issue_id (int) – DB issue id
  • issue_tracker_id (int) – issue tracker id
  • summary (str) – new issue description
  • component (str) – component where the issue was found
  • version (str) – version where the issue was found
  • hardware (str) – hardware where the issue was found
  • priority (str) – priority of the issue
  • severity (str) – severity of the issue
  • reference_id (int) – id of the Git reference where the issue was found
  • last_change_at (str) – last change date of the issue
